info.name: assignment3
info.description:
This collection tests the API specification given for Assignment 2.  
In order to run this collection, use the environment file assignment2.environment.json. That environment file has some predefined variables needed by the tests in this collection. There is only one variable in that file that you need to set when running your collection

app_url

- Set the value of this variable to the URL of your app. E.g., when running locally set it to [http://127.0.0.1:8080](http://127.0.0.1:8080). When running the app on GCP. set it to the URL of your app on GCP, e.g., [https://a2-chaudhrn-osu.uc.r.appspot.com](https://a2-chaudhrn-osu.uc.r.appspot.com)
